data.text: Sabbathni ahong heka, Pathienni jînga khuo ahongvâra, Mary Magdalene le Mary dang hah thân en rangin an sea.
Inningloiin ningnu râttak ahong innîka, invân renga Pumapa Vântîrton a juonga; lung hah a muluoi paia a chungah ânsunga.
A mêl chu kôlinlek ang ania, a puonsilngei khom rodokang anga chek ani.
Râlmi a ngâkngei han an chi rai zoi sikin an innîka, athi anghan an oma.
Vântîrton han nupangngei kôm, “Nangni chu chino roi, Jisua an jêmdelpu hah nin rok ani ti ki riet.
Hin om khâi maka; ai ti anghan ân thoinôk zoi. Hin hong ungla, a jâlna hih hong en roi.
Atûn inrangtakin se ungla, a ruoisingei kôm, Thina renga ân thoinôk zoi, Galilee rama nin motona a lei se; mason mûng nin tih! Nangni ki ril hih riettit roi” a tia.
Hanchu, ichi le râisânna sipin, thân renga an se lalaia, ruoisingei varil rangin an tân zoi.
Inningloiin Jisua'n anni hah a tonga, an kôm, “Nin chunga rathanngamna om rese” a tia. Hanchu, a kôm an honga, a kepha an sûra, chubai an mûka.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Chino roi, se ungla, Galilee rama se rangin ku sûngsuokngei varil roi; mason ni mûng an tih” a tia.
Nupangngei hah lama an lôn lâitakin thân ngak râlmi senkhatngei hah khopuiliena an kîr nôka, neinun om tie murdi hah ochaisingei an va rila.
Ochaisingei hah Upangei leh anin mua lungvâr an thoa; râlmingei kôm han sum tamtatak an pêka,
an kôm, “Jâna kin inkârin a ruoisingei an honga, a ruok an hong muruk ani, tiin misîr roi.
Râiôt han ha thurchi hah a lei riet lekhom, theiloina dôn mak chei tiin nangni rilpui kin ta, ite nin mulung nin minjîngna rang omak,” an tia.
Râlmingei han sum hah an lâka, chong an be lam angtakhan an tho zoi. Masikin atûn tenah ha thurchi hah Judangei lâia an la ril minlum bang ngâi ani.
Hanchu ruoisi sômleikhat ngei hah Galilee rama tâng inkhata Jisua'n se roi a tipe ngeina han an sea.28:16: Mat 26:32; Mk 14:28
Ama an mûn chu chubai an mûka, senkhatin iem tatak no khom senla ngei.
Jisua'n ahong nâia, an kôm, “Pilchunga le Invâna rachamneina murdi ko kôm pêk ani zoi.
Hanchu, muntina mingei murdi kôm se ungla, ku ruoisîn sin ngei ungla: Pa, Nâipasal le Ratha Inthieng rimingin Baptis ngei ungla,28:19: Sin 1:8
chong nangni ke pêk murdi jôm rangin ril ngei roi. Male Keima zoratin rammuol mong dênin nin kôma om tit ki tih,” a tia.
